title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Enterprise-Ready Agentic Speech AI Pipelines on AWS (AIM280)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在 AWS 上构建企业级代理语音 AI 管道 (AIM280)
abstract: Enterprises in financial services, healthcare, and customer service are rapidly adopting agentic AI and voice agents to transform how they serve customers, from secure transcription and summarization to intelligent voice agents. In this panel, NVIDIA and partners share lessons learned from deploying GPU-accelerated speech AI pipelines in production. This presentation is brought to you by NVIDIA, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 金融服务、医疗保健和客户服务领域的企业正在快速采用代理式AI和语音代理，以转变其服务客户的方式，从安全转录和摘要到智能语音代理。在本次小组讨论中，NVIDIA及其合作伙伴分享了在生产环境中部署GPU加速语音AI管道的经验教训。本演示由AWS合作伙伴NVIDIA提供。

presenter.name: Andrew Sun
presenter.title: Senior Director, Business Development - Retail, CPG, QSR
